title: shAnthamAga un
sahitya:
shAntamAga un sannadhiyil irundE dhyAnam sheivadE paramAnandam appA



anupallavi



kAntam pOl en manam kavarnda un jyOtiyaik-karuttil irutti

endak-kavalaiyum illAmal



caraNam



yAnenru ahankarikkum Anavam kiLambAmal AshApAshattAl manam

ushaliTTalaiyAmal

mOnattilE pUtta jnAnat-tAmarai pOlE muTru mun sEvaDip-paTruDanE nidam
